messages.subject: Hello Intro.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi,  I am an unschooling mom from AZ.  We live in a rural area of wildernss, gardens, horses and creeks.  I think the term crunchy has been used.  I am a
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I am an unschooling mom from AZ. We live in a rural area of
wildernss, gardens, horses and creeks. I think the term "crunchy" has
been used. I am a photographer, artist and writer and my family manages
a remote environmental education and research center. I have two
teenagers who are in school now (unschooled til 8th grade) and my
daughter (almost 10) has never been to school. I look forward to being
part of this wonderful group.

I (just this month) published an article in Life Learning Magazine
<http://www.lifelearningmagazine.com/1008/index.htm> which most of you
probably already know is a great treasure.

I have a lot of catch up reading to do; Can't wait to meet you all.

Kerry
My website/Blog: Creek and Mesa <http://www.creekandmesa.com/Home.html>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
